item.title: News Collection: Climate and Environment
item.description: This is a collection of newspaper articles related to climate and the environment, which I am interested in. Where My Climate Doubts Began to Melt, NYT, Oct/28/2022, link . Global Warming /& Extreme Heat Climate Risks Loom Over Panama Canal, a Vital Global Trade Link, NYT, Aug/25/2023, link . 1. Lack of rain and changing weather patterns are slowing the ship traffic that moves goods around the world.
